dcterms:description: A dataset used for training and evaluating neural radiance fields, specifically designed to address aliasing issues in rendering at varying camera distances.
dcterms:title: Multi-scale Blender dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset utilized for training and evaluating neural radiance fields, focusing on multi-scale rendering to improve image quality at different resolutions.
